mapper.update:
UPDATE promotion_config
promotion_id = #{promotionId},
rule_time_config_1 = #{ruleTimeConfig1},
rule_time_config_2 = #{ruleTimeConfig2},
rule_type = #{ruleType},
rule_amount = #{ruleAmount},
rule_amount_ext1 = #{ruleAmountExt1},
rule_val = #{ruleVal},
rule_val_1 = #{ruleVal1},
rule_val_str1 = #{ruleValStr1},
rule_val_str2 = #{ruleValStr2},
platform_id = #{platformId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
